task.summary: Added OneToOne, OneToMany and ManyToMany entity relationships
Added web tier entities representation, converters and tests
Added CRUD operations on Recipes with tests and listing all Ingredients of specified Recipe
Added new ingredient adding, updating and unit and integration tests
